statements: DELETE FROM InformedConsent WHERE researcher_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM InformedConsent WHERE consent_date < '2021-01-01' AND research_study = 'StudyA';
DELETE FROM research_projects WHERE status = 'completed' AND end_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM InformedConsentParticipants WHERE participant_id = 100 AND consent_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM ConsentDocuments WHERE document_type = 'PDF' AND document_size > 5000;
DELETE FROM InformedConsent WHERE document = 'Important Document';
DELETE FROM Participant WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'Female';
